metadata.title: RHSA-2025:0064: kernel-rt security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The kernel-rt packages provide the Real Time Linux Kernel, which enables fine-tuning for systems with extremely high determinism requirements.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: i40e: Do not allow untrusted VF to remove administratively set MAC (CVE-2024-26830)

* kernel: net/sched: Fix UAF when resolving a clash (CVE-2024-41040)

* kernel: mptcp: cope racing subflow creation in mptcp_rcv_space_adjust (CVE-2024-53122)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
